title: Unable to Find Facebook Friends
body:
Hello,

I have been trying to Add Friends by Social Network. I click on the Facebook button and I get no pop-ups, no re-directs...nothing. There is no option for me to connect my Facebook account anywhere and I don't know if it already is or not.

I have not been able to find any help articles on this and any thread I see posted are from roughly two years and a few client updates ago.

Any help is appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up, the button doesn't appear to be working on the client currently.  Submit a report over to the [bug boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)so our QA team can take a look.  Hang tight until this gets resolved!
